data.name: Music Maker 2019 Premium Steam Edition
data.detailed_description:
For even better sounding music

With Music Maker 2019 Premium Steam Edition, it's incredibly easy to produce incredibly good-sounding music. Use drag and drop to combine loops and instruments and apply effects. Music Maker Premium Steam Edition features a new professional audio engine for crystal-clear sound and multicore support which lets you use more instruments, sounds and effects without any loss in performance.

Your Music Maker. Your choice.

Music Maker Premium Steam Edition gives you the room you need to bring your ideas to life. And now you can even customize Music Maker to fit your personal style.
Simply select the sounds, features and instruments which matter most to you to create your very own Music Maker.Access the Music Maker Store from right within the program and browse the latest sounds from the world's most popular music genres. Equip your Music Maker with new virtual instruments and powerful features like unlimited tracks.

Music Maker Premium Steam Edition:

  • Comes with 1 Soundpool Collection and 3 Extra Soundpools of your choice
  • Includes 8 professional instruments, 9 feature packs and 3 present packs of your choice
  • Easy to use: Simply drag and drop to create music
  • Comes with our professional Samplitude audio engine for amazing sound
  • Features powerful multicore support for better performance
  • Easy expansion: Get thousands of new sounds, features and instruments – directly in the Music Maker Store.
  • Always up to date: Get free updates for as long as we develop the software

data.short_description: The original for making music: Music Maker Premium Steam Edition.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Dutch, Finnish, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Swedish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 | 8 | 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard, minimum resolution 1280 x 768
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Music Maker 2019 Premium Steam Edition
